title: Ignite Your Life!: How to Get From Where You Are To Where You Want to Be
description: Imagine you could ... Love the Life you Live and Live the Life you LoveImagine what it would be like if you loved absolutely everything about your life. Imagine you aren’t holding back at all. Imagine you have no fear and are daring to play bigger than you have ever dared. Imagine a life without resignation, without suffering or just getting by. Imagine your life is just as you imagine, just the way you want it, and it’s totally of your creation.Ignite your Life! takes you on your journey of discovery to uncover the gap between where you are now and where you want to be. You will clarify what’s missing for you to truly ignite your life. Simply follow the step-by-step system to design and live the juicy life of your dreams!
author: Andrea Woolf
